description: I work as a Senior Consultant for Readify Pty Ltd. Readify is an Australia-wide software consulting company specialised in Microsoft technologies. We have a lot of MVPs and ALT.NET developers (for example, we have the writers of Castle and Autofac IoCs, and Linfu dynamic proxy used in NHibernate, am...
